title: Image Of Deepika And Ranveer Wearing 'Vote For BJP' Scarves Is Photoshopped
subtitle: The original image is after the couple's wedding when they visited the Siddhivanayak Temple in Mumbai
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are supporting and campaigning for the BJP

The text 'Vote For BJP' seen on the scarf is photoshopped. The original picture was taken when Deepika and Ranveer visited Siddhivinayak Temple is Mumbai on November 30, 2018, after their wedding. The original photos shows them only wearing an orange scarf with no text on it.
